sell(Player, Shop) - Method in class commandline.ShopCommandLine
Command line interface to choose to sell an item, monster or return back to the shop.
sellItem(Player, Shop) - Method in class commandline.ShopCommandLine
Command line interface for selling an item to the shop, the player's items are displayed and the player is prompted to return to the prievious menu or choose an item to sell.
sellMonster(Player, Shop) - Method in class commandline.ShopCommandLine
Command line interface for selling a monster to the shop, the player's monster's are displayed and the player is prompted to return to the prievious menu or choose a monster to sell.
sellPurchaseable(Player, Purchaseable) - Method in class game.Shop
Sells an object to the shop giving the player the sell price of the object in gold.

setActiveMonster(Monster) - Method in class game.Player
Sets the active monster index to the index of the given monster.
setActiveMonsterIndex(int) - Method in class game.Player
Sets the active monster index and marks that monster as active during battle, as such this should be used even within the Player class instead of setting activeMonsterIndex directly.

SetupScreen - Class in GUI
Initial screen to setup the game, ask player to enter name, choose starting monster, set number of days for the game and the difficulty.

shop - Variable in class GUI.ShopScreen
 
Shop - Class in game
The Shop conatins some stock, that is refreshed each day, and a variable tracking the total gold spent by the player.
Shop() - Constructor for class game.Shop
 
ShopCommandLine - Class in commandline
Command line interface for the shop, allowing the player to view and buy stock, and sell their own items and monsters.

Start - Class in commandline
The entry point for the command line application, it sets up the game environment and passes off the running of the game to Main.

stock - Variable in class game.Shop
A static array of the stock, which is always 9 purchaseable objects.
